metadata.title: USN-7242-1 -- Tomcat vulnerability
metadata.description: Pierre Ernst discovered that the Tomcat JmxRemoteLifecycleListener did not implement a recommended fix. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7242-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libservlet2.4-java - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 libservlet2.5-java - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 libservlet2.5-java-doc - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 libtomcat6-java - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 tomcat6 - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 tomcat6-admin - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 tomcat6-common - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 tomcat6-docs - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 tomcat6-examples - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 tomcat6-extras - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 tomcat6-user - 6.0.39-1ubuntu0.1+esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
